                         java.util.UUID photoId,
                         int points)

        Parameters:
        accountId - : The one that is rating the photo
        photoId - : The photo that is being rated
        points - : Between 1 to 5, 5 being highest and 1 lowest

      • deleteAccount

        public boolean deleteAccount(java.util.UUID uuid)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Delete an account from the database
        Parameters:
        uuid - : The UUID of the account that needs to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if the update succeeded an false if you get an Empty result data access Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when UUId is null
